name: Conventional Combat... NOT!
description:
One arena, ten waves. Use WASD to move.

Tips And Tricks:

  • When a new wave starts, stick to the sides of the arena. Enemies spawn in the middle

Current Bugs:

  • When you have no health left you don't die. If you're feeling fair, you can restart the level through the pause menu.
  • Enemies that shoot projectiles have some wonky movement.

The theme was: Unconventional Means
